name: Dwarf Workday
description:
Dwarf Workday is an adventure-platformer where you play as a little Dwarf in a classic workday down the mine.
Explore the mine, hook, find raw diamonds and refine them with two giant hammers.

You can hook to the walls in order to mine raw diamonds. If you found enough diamond of the same color you'll unlock a new power up (for example a longer rope, or a way to hook upwards).

This game was made in 13 days for the Gamedev.js Jam 2022 where we had to implement web monetization and the theme "Raw" into a game. For the theme I decided to introduce this dwarf that needs to find raw diamonds by exploring a mine. About the web monetization part I put a little yellow radar that can help people find the raw diamonds more easily. To activate web monetization the player needs to activate a subscription on the Coil site.

 Follow me on twitter if you like my game @hav24  

Controls

- WASD or Arrow keys to move.
- "X" to jump. 
- "C" to hook.
- "UP" + "C" to hook upwards (it works only after unlocking this power up)
